item.title: Beyond REST
item.description: We’re implementing REST, but it is introducing problems we didn’t have before. So, what’s the point? I blurted out a couple of thoughts on how they must be doing REST wrong, and when their responses involving implementation went over my head, I rambled about buzzwords, industry inertia and other things, but not in any coherent sentences. I quickly realized I had no idea what I was talking about and have since spent a lot of time trying to educate myself on the popular architecture.
